series_description: This series consists of the audit support documentation from closed business tax audits, which are conducted by the field auditors or district offices. May include, but is not limited to, a Report of Field Audit (Form ST-48), audit comments that are signed by the field auditors and their supervisor, letter to audited business delivering the audit report, and other supporting documentation. These audits typically cover 2 to 5 year periods of time.
retention_statement: Retain 7 years after audit is closed out, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Audit Records: Individual Virginia Income Tax Audits
series_description: This series consists of individual Virginia income tax returns that have been selected as a result of a Federal audit or the Federal Compare program. Includes the individual Virginia tax return and supporting documentation, as well as a letter from Virginia Tax Compliance office notifying the taxpayer of a discrepancy between his/her state and federal return and an audit information worksheet.
retention_statement: Retain 7 years after audit is closed out, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Combined Registration Application: Virginia Business Tax
series_description: This series consists of the Combined Registration Application
retention_statement: Retain 4 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Estate of Decedents – Master Index Cards Defunct series
series_description: This series consists of cross-index card for Paid or Non-Taxable Inheritance Tax Returns submitted by the State
retention_statement: Due to the life expectancy of last tax inheritor, retain in agency until January 1, 2081. Destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the filing and payment of individual Virginia estate tax. Includes the original signed Virginia estate tax return (Form EST-80), a complete copy of the federal estate tax return (Form 706), and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: Retain for 20 years from Year of Death, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of State and Federal returns that are matched up and compared to ensure that they are identical and/or the individual is considered a non-filer. Includes discrepancy reports, correspondence, and if required, copies of invoices that have been sent to the individual.
retention_statement: Retain 4 years or until listed in series 008007, "Income Tax Returns, Individual-Annual Purge Book", whichever is longer, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Destroy all additional versions, regardless of media, in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page when no longer administratively necessary.

series_description: This series documents the filing and payment of Virginia business income tax. Includes the original signed Virginia income tax return and any additional schedules and supporting documentation required to be filed. Selected returns for each year are audited.
retention_statement: Retain 7 years unless audited, then retain 7 years after audit is closed out. Destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Note: Each year's returns are reformatted to microfilm. Reel cannot be destroyed until 7 years after all audits done on those selected returns have been closed out.

series_title: Inheritance Tax Records – Paid Defunct series
series_description: This series documents the filing and payment of Virginia inheritance tax. After December 1, 1980, this series was superseded by series 009046, "Estate Tax Records".
retention_statement: Due to the life expectancy of last tax inheritor, retain in agency until January 1, 2081. Destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Inheritance Tax Records – Non-Taxable Returns Defunct series This series is used in checking fiduciary income tax returns filed by personal representatives and trustees, and for checking future inheritance tax returns in the case of remainder interest. After December 1, 1980, this series was superseded by series 009046, "Estate Tax Records". Replaces Schedule 161-2 Revised, dated 7/1/1965
retention_statement: Due to the life expectancy of last tax inheritor, retain in agency until January 1, 2081. Destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Real Property Identification Maps Defunct Series
series_description: This series consists of county maps of real property for tax determination.
retention_statement: Retain for 5 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Virginia/Federal Set-Off Debt Program - Treasury Offset Program (TOP)
series_description: This series consists of invoices for payment of state income taxes owed by taxpayer to the Virginia Department of Taxation and the receipt of payment from the U.S. Treasury Department. Through a federal program, the Treasury Offset Program (TOP), the U.S. Treasury will reduce or withhold any of the eligible Federal Tax refund by the amount of the debt and refund the money back to the state.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after complete debt has been satisfied, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
